<h1 align="center">
  Dashboard in React with Covid-19
</h1>

## DEMO

- The link is :  [https://covid-19-app.netlify.com/](https://covid-19-app.netlify.com/)

## Instalation

- `git clone git@github.com:alexislepresle/covid-19.git`
- `cd covid-19`
- `npm install`
- `gatsby develop`
- Visit http://localhost:8000

## Data Source

Data source from [https://covid19.mathdro.id](https://github.com/mathdroid/covid-19-api) API
